Title: Appoints ad hoc members to the New York state board on electric generation siting and the environment
Summary: Relates to appointing ad hoc members to the New York state board on electric generation siting and the environment; provides notification of the status of proposed candidates for appointment.
LawCode: Amd ยง161, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to appointing ad hoc members to the New York state board on electric generation siting and the environment
